summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Photography Portfolio website. All backend APIs (31 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified homepage, admin login, admin dashboard, Security page, YouTube admin page, Section Content CMS page, and Social Media section. All requested features are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: React useEffect hooks have missing dependencies warnings (AdminSecurity.jsx, AdminYouTube.jsx, AdminSectionContent.jsx) - minor ESLint warnings, not blocking functionality
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - existing data used for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: 1) Admin login with bcrypt password hashing works with admin/admin123, 2) Admin Security page at /admin/security allows credential changes with old password verification, 3) YouTube admin page at /admin/youtube has all form fields for API configuration, 4) Section Content CMS at /admin/section-content allows editing titles/subtitles for all sections, 5) Social Media section displays correctly on homepage with Facebook/Instagram/YouTube icons, 6) Hero carousel auto-rotation working (5 second interval). Facebook integration requires user-provided API credentials to function.

features_verified.admin_security_page: WORKING - /admin/security displays form for changing credentials
features_verified.social_media_section: WORKING - Displays correctly with icons on homepage
